description: Buying an apartment in Getafe Norte is easy: Bright, with Pool and Garage. Discover your New Home! The interior design includes a cozy hall-distributor, a spacious living room, kitchen, three bedrooms and two full bathrooms, one of them en suite. Equipped with heating and hot water through an individual natural gas boiler, as well as air conditioning and ducted heat pump throughout the house, this house offers comfort in all seasons. In addition, you can enjoy a well-deserved dip in the building's pool. For greater comfort, it has an excellent parking space, included in the price. This apartment in Getafe Norte has a privileged location, characterized by its tranquility, wide avenues and green areas. With direct access to the M-45 and the Toledo highway (A-42), it easily connects you through the Espartales or El Bercial Metro-Sur stop in 10 minutes, as well as to the Las Margaritas commuter station. in another 10 minutes. The proximity to essential services, shops, gyms and large stores such as Carrefour and El Corte Inglés make this neighborhood an exceptional place to live. On the first floor, there are two single bedrooms and a 14m² master bedroom with a full dressing room, en-suite bathroom and access to a terrace. It also has a full bathroom with a bathtub. description: HOMLI presents this stunning four-storey townhouse in Getafe. With an enviable location and a host of exceptional amenities, this home is a true paradise for those looking for the best in comfort and lifestyle. The property offers ample living space with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, making it the perfect place for families or those who value space and privacy. The large living/dining room is the heart of the home, with an elegant and cozy design that invites relaxation and conviviality. But what really sets this property apart is its impressive terrace, which spans from east to west orientation, ensuring an abundance of natural light throughout the day. In addition, the garden is a true oasis of relaxation. With a sparkling pool, a barbecue area and an outdoor bar, you can enjoy your days and gatherings with friends and family in a private and lush environment. The greenery surrounding the property brings freshness and serenity, creating a truly unique ambiance. An outstanding feature of this home is the approximately 30m2 living room, which lends itself to a variety of possibilities. Whether you wish to create a home office, a playroom for the little ones, your own private cinema, a gym or a multi-purpose space, this room has the potential to fulfill all your needs. This property in Getafe represents an exceptional opportunity to live in luxury, comfort and luminosity.
